author: cmpilato
msg: Unroll duct tape; tear on the perpendicular; apply to svnsync insufficient
arguments errors.
* subversion/svnsync/main.c
(main): Catch errors that have a known-to-be-moronic default error string,
and rethrow them (effectively) with an error string that's more appropriate
for this application.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix an editor driving sequence bug in svnsync.
* subversion/svnsync/main.c
(close_edit): If you call open_root(), you must also call close_directory()
before closing the edit with close_edit().

author: cmpilato
msg: Code cleanups in svnsync.
This change collapses the identical dir_baton_t and file_baton_t
editor baton structures into a single node_baton_t, and loses
unnecessary SVN_ERR() invocations.
* subversion/svnsync/main.c
(node_baton_t): New, the combined form of ...
(dir_baton_t, file_baton_t): ... these now-removed structure definitions.
(open_root, delete_entry, add_directory, open_directory, add_file,
open_file, apply_textdelta, close_file, absent_file, close_directory,
absent_directory, change_file_prop, change_dir_prop, close_edit):
Track renamed baton items, and lose unnecessary SVN_ERR() invocations
and whitespace.

author: cmpilato
msg: Disallow the copying of svn:sync-* properties when using svnsync, and
report to the user when those properties have been skipped as part of
the syncronization effort.
This fixes a bug which occurs when mirroring a mirror.  Upon
initializing the mirror-of-a-mirror, svnsync would allow you to copy
all the revprops of revision 0 from the original mirror, causing the
mirror-of-a-mirror to now carry svn:sync-* properties that applied to
the original mirror.  So a mirror-of-a-mirror would now effectively be
configured to be a mirror of the wrong source repository, and have
false information about what had already been syncronized from that
repository.
* subversion/svnsync/main.c
(copy_revprops): Don't copy svn:sync* properties.  Also, change the
printed message to indicate that svn:sync- properties were
skipped, if any were. (Unfortunately for the diff, I had to move
this function further up in the file.)
(do_initialize): Just use copy_revprops() to do the initial property
copy, and lose the code which would now be a duplicate of copy_revprops().
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svnsync_tests.py
(run_init): Tweak the expected output.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Add comment about later implementing a
conflict resolution mode hook.
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(do_merge, do_single_file_merge): Add in-line comment.
